inboxEndTaskPart2: Looks like everything's organized in the right place.
notFoundPart1: Maybe this page moved? Got deleted? Is hiding out in quarantine? Never existed in the first place?

name: Name
logTodoListGoogle: Log in to TodoList with your Google.
permanentlyDeleteAccountText: This will immediately delete all of your data including tasks, projects, comments, and more. This canâ€™t be undone.
changeEmailAddressText: Update the email you use for your TodoList account. Your email is currently
passwordInfoText: Your password must be at least 8 characters long contain a number and an uppercase letter.
sadFarewell: We'll be sorry to see you go, but thanks for trying TodoList!
deleteAccountWarning: Deleting your account is permanent. <1>All your data will be wiped out immediately</1> and you won't be able to get it back.
deleteAccountWarning2: Deleting your account requires your current password as confirmation. If you signed up via Google, you can set a password in Account settings.
connectedAccountsInfo1: You can log in to TodoList with your Google account
connectedAccountsInfo2: Your password is not set, so we cannot disconnect you from your Google account. If you want to disconnect, please <1>set up your password</1> first.
inputDateInfo: You can also type in recurring due dates like <1>today</1>, <1>tomorrow</1>, <1>next week</1> and <1>weekends</1>.
PlaySoundWhenTaskCompleted: Play a sound when tasks are completed.
YouCanAddCommentsForYourTask: You can add comments for your task
swipeMenuInform: You can also close and open the menu by pressing the button or swipe left and right.
contexMenuInform: You can edit, prioritize, date and delete tasks by right-clicking or holding on the touch device.
soundVibrationInform: In default vibration and sound for mobile turn on, you can also turn off them.
topFooterTitle: Stay up-to-date on all things TodoList by following us on social media.
globalTodoListText: Create and access your to-do lists from anywhere: desktop, mobile phone, or browser tab. Now you'll never miss an idea or forget what you need to do next.
createPerfectList: Create the perfect list for every need.
customizationText: You can make TodoList show what you want, how you want. Add formatting, coloring, and link items with assignees or tasks to transform lists into actionable workflows.
neverMissTask: Never miss a task or idea again.
organizationText: TodoList Home view makes it easy to view and customize everything you need to work on. Set reminders, reschedule tasks, and assign priorities so you never lose anything again.
detailsTaskText: Add checklists to any task in TodoList to create clear processes for yourself
CreateClearActionItems: Create clear action items for tasks.
prevueTitle: The do list to organize work & life
